channel.title: My compiler wont work please help ( i changed java update )
channel.description: when i click on compile it says . . . System cannot find path specified . . . Ive coded many sources on this computer and all of a sudden i cant compile any more. please help i changed the "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12" -d ./bin ./src/*.javato "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21" -d ./bin ./src/*.java and it still wont work. ive tryed to Uninstall and re install many times i downloaded java u 21. because thats what i used to have and it still work work so please help.

item.title: My compiler wont work please help ( i changed java update )
item.dc:creator: @alex809 alex809
item.description:
@alex809 wrote:

what you need to do is change it to this

this is what your compiler should say

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

just change the jdk version to ur current version you can find ur current version by going to computer then c: (your local drive or acer) then program files then java and u get ur jdk version there if there is no jdk then download it from oracle at this link https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u23-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

if u are running any type of windows software then select windows

Read full topic
